message.body: Hey! Are we still on for today?? If so, I need to go buy a sports bra during lunch ha
Yes! Haha as long as that works for you!
Got a sports bra and pants so we're good to go!
Haha wonderful!! Can't wait!
Does the 6:15 class still work for you? It's the basic yoga class
Yeah that's fine by me!
See you soon?
Aim I forcing you to do yoga today? I'd be happy to do dinner if you want! Either way I'm game!

Haha no I am happy to do yoga any day!! I actually signed up for their membership on tuesday! (They're having a crazy special, $39 a month) but if you just want to do dinner that's fine too, I'm flexible! :-)
Yoga it is! I haven't done it since the last time we did it. My body could really use it! How often have you been going?

I've been trying to go twice a week...though I took a couple weeks off around xmas and new year's. And stacey retired! (Serious sad face) but it looks like a new instructor is taking over rockin yoga next week so she better be good!!
I'm coming!!!!! Ugh! I can never get out of here!
Haha no worries! The downstairs studio is still locked but when it opens up I'll get us spots!
Thank you!
OH MY GOODNESS!!!! You look STUNNING!!!!!!!!! I LOVE IT!!!! What do you think!? Thoughts?? Any concerns??
I am LOVING it!! I thibk the straps need to be shortened a tiny bit, but that's an extremely easy fix! Eeeee!!
And thank you!!!
Oh my gosh! I love love love it!!! How's the back!?
Straps are easy to fix ESP with a good steam stress
Seamstress*
And with my heels the length is perfect, I don't think it even needs to be hemmed!
AHHHHHHH!!!! LOVE the back!!!!! Absolutely incredible!!!!!
Nope, I think you're right. You are beautiful!
:-D:-D:-D Thank you!!! I think this is going to be the one!!
Yayayayay!!! CONGRATULATIONS!!!!
Eeeeee thank you!!!!!
So happy for you! Can't wait to see it on you in June!!!!!
Yayyy!!!!
